about.title: About Me
about.paragraph: With more than 4 years of experience in the Web Development field, I stand out for my capacity for continuous learning and my efficiency in solving challenges in every project I undertake.

services.title: Services
services.description: I develop modern, scalable web applications with a focus on quality and performance.

design.title: Web Design
design.description: Beautiful and elegant designs with interactive interfaces that are intuitive, effective and pleasant to use for the user.

development.title: Development
development.description: Custom web development tailored to your specifications, designed to deliver a flawless user experience.

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.description: Development of websites that perfectly adapt to any device, providing an optimal user experience at all times.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Technologies I've used in various projects throughout my career

achievements.first: Developed advanced web interfaces for local and international companies using modern Vue ecosystem technologies.
achievements.second: Implemented custom KYC panels and CRM platforms, with partial involvement in backend tasks and system integration.
achievements.third: Led frontend architecture for complex projects, focusing on performance, scalability, and user experience.
achievements.fourth: Collaborated closely with international teams to ensure alignment and efficiency across project development.

achievements.first: Built responsive and interactive interfaces for the tourism sector, focusing on usability and adaptability.
achievements.second: Optimized browser performance through modular development and frontend best practices.
achievements.third: Contributed to user-oriented projects involving API integration and continuous UX improvement.
